self_contained_context.background: The existing install_nwave.py needs to integrate the new preflight checker, output formatter, and context detector to provide the improved installation experience.
prerequisites: 03-03: CI Mode Output Formatting must be complete
self_contained_context.technical_context: Modify install_nwave.py to call preflight_checker.run_preflight_checks() before any build actions. Use context_detector to select output mode. Use output_formatter for error display. Maintain backward compatibility with existing installer functionality.

task_specification.name: Installer Pre-flight Integration
task_specification.description: Modify install_nwave.py to call preflight_checker before any build actions. Add output_formatter for error display. Connect context_detector for output mode selection.
task_specification.motivation: This integration step connects all new components into the existing installer, enabling the improved error handling and context-aware output.
task_specification.detailed_instructions: 1. Import preflight_checker, output_formatter, context_detector in install_nwave.py. 2. Call run_preflight_checks() at start of main(). 3. If preflight fails, use output_formatter to display error and exit. 4. Use context_detector to select terminal/JSON/CI output mode. 5. Maintain existing functionality for successful preflight.
task_specification.acceptance_criteria: Integration step - scenarios already enabled in Phase 02 and 03; This enables end-to-end flow through real installer
